subject: Margin Call Response from PLC A to CITIBANK N.A.
content:
Dear Sir/Madam,

In response to your margin call, PLC A fully disagrees for valuation date November 09, 2018.

Our MTM is USD 1,751,846.24

Our Collateral Balance is USD 1,890,000.00


Best regards,

xxxxxxx-xxxxxx | xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx 

PLC A 

PLC A Xxxxxxxxxxxxxx

Phone. 111 11 111 1111 / 1111 / 1111    Fax. 111 11 111 111

xxx xxxxxx xxxxx, xxxx 1 | 11 xxxx | 1111-1111 xxxxxx | xxx

xxxxx.xxxxxxxx@xxxxxx.xxx <mailto:xxxxx.xxxxxxxx@xxxxxx.xxx> 


________________________________



	

 

Sent from the Outsystems Workflow Platform
